Zelenskiy counts on more Western defence aid for Ukraine in next two monthsPresident Volodymyr Zelenskiy said on Saturday that he expected a number of new Western defence packages for Ukraine to be signed this and next month. Sat, 20 Jan 2024 23:24:22 GMT 7RS4ZEWOQROI7DFSFXOJ6IUB3M https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/zelenskiy-counts-more-western-defence-aid-ukraine-next-two-months-2024-01-20/Nick Starkov世界欧洲
Putin showed intention to visit Pyongyang soon, North Korea saysRussian President Vladimir Putin showed his intention to visit Pyongyang soon, North Korea's state media KCNA reported on Sunday. Sat, 20 Jan 2024 23:18:33 GMT LBNMP4Q62NIYZAG2S4IAYJANEM https://www.reuters.com/world/putin-showed-intention-visit-pyongyang-soon-north-korea-says-2024-01-20/Reuters世界
Residents of southern Mexican town set govt palace on fire after police kill young manResidents of a Mexican town set fire to the municipal palace overnight on Friday in a violent protest after local police shot a young man in the neck, according to his relatives, after he did not stop his car at a checkpoint. Sat, 20 Jan 2024 22:53:31 GMT TOACEC2VINNDLMBI66JRWFH754 https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/residents-southern-mexican-town-set-govt-palace-fire-after-police-kill-young-man-2024-01-20/Reuters世界美洲
Saudi says escalating tensions amid Houthi attacks and US strikes are dangerousSaudi Arabia's foreign minister said the kingdom was "very worried" that tensions in the Red Sea amid attacks by Yemen's Houthis and U.S. strikes on Houthi targets could spiral out of control and escalate the conflict in the region. Sat, 20 Jan 2024 21:41:35 GMT 2TZ5MOJ53VOL5JLV5WRYM2QO5Y https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/saudi-says-escalating-tensions-amid-houthi-attacks-us-strikes-are-dangerous-2024-01-20/Kanishka Singh世界中东
Israeli soldiers uncover Gaza tunnel that once held hostages, army saysSoldiers found narrow rooms behind metal bars, toilets, mattresses and drawings by a child hostage who was freed. Sat, 20 Jan 2024 20:37:57 GMT 2JV2JGF2JBIOXLKGZ6LNQDJCCQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israeli-soldiers-uncover-gaza-tunnel-that-once-held-hostages-army-2024-01-20/Reuters世界中东
Protesters call for change to Netanyahu governmentThousands of Israelis gathered in Tel Aviv on Saturday to protest against Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's government, accusing the veteran leader of mishandling the nation's security and calling for a new election. Sat, 20 Jan 2024 19:31:11 GMT XJ4O4QIMQ5MMTK2KLO2LRL42HQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/protesters-tel-aviv-call-change-netanyahu-government-2024-01-20/Reuters世界中东
US strikes another Houthi anti-ship missileU.S. Central Command forces on Saturday struck a Houthi anti-ship missile that was aimed into the Gulf of Aden and prepared to launch, the U.S. military said, with the latest round of strikes coming hours after the United States struck three other Houthi anti-ship missiles. Sat, 20 Jan 2024 17:19:19 GMT VTTWGYGONBLNHGIRYNOPQBEMWI https://www.reuters.com/world/us-strikes-another-houthi-anti-ship-missile-2024-01-20/Kanishka Singh, Enas Alashray世界
US personnel suffer minor injuries in Iraq base attack: U.S. officialU.S. personnel suffered minor injuries and a member of Iraq's security forces was wounded in an attack on Iraq's Ain al-Asad air base on Saturday, a U.S. official said on Saturday, speaking on condition of anonymity. Sat, 20 Jan 2024 17:17:32 GMT 5AM24L4S2ZP33FPP5R5RLQ7QGE https://www.reuters.com/world/us-personnel-suffer-minor-injuries-iraq-base-attack-us-official-2024-01-20/Phil Stewart, Timour Azhari世界
Congolese President Tshisekedi sworn in for second term after disputed voteDemocratic Republic of Congo President Felix Tshisekedi was sworn in for a second five-year term on Saturday after a landslide victory his opponents have refused to recognise due to widespread irregularities over the December general election. Sat, 20 Jan 2024 14:20:22 GMT JOFMQ76G7VNXTGEDUN3IDAQ4CI https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/congolese-president-tshisekedi-sworn-second-term-2024-01-20/Ange Kasongo世界非洲
At Putin campaign HQ, soldier's wife says bring him homeThe wife of a Russian soldier delivered an emotional appeal for his return from Ukraine on Saturday at the election headquarters of President Vladimir Putin, a defiant gesture in a country where open criticism of the war is banned. Sat, 20 Jan 2024 13:43:10 GMT PGYKCJTSV5MILIUGKN3M7LGLSQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/putin-campaign-hq-soldiers-wife-says-bring-him-home-2024-01-20/Reuters世界欧洲
Seoul police chief indicted over Halloween crushSouth Korean prosecutors have indicted the head of the Seoul Metropolitan Police Agency​, charging him with contributing through negligence to the Halloween crowd crush in Seoul in 2022​ that killed nearly 160 people, according to the Seoul Western District Prosecutors Office. Sat, 20 Jan 2024 12:48:47 GMT GSLYWF7V25NZFLNO27AMXSN3JU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/seoul-police-chief-indicted-over-halloween-crush-2024-01-20/Reuters世界亚太地区
